channel.title: Please help me fix:( RUN issue
channel.description:
[code]@echo off title Client Command cd LIB color 0c JAVA -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause[/code]
error: [code]The system cannot find the path specified. 'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
java: "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_35 help fix please
